text.Nicholson School of Communication and Me: Nicholson School of Communication and Media

li.Not open to Journalism, Radio-TV, or Adv: Not open to Journalism, Radio-TV, or Advertising/Public Relations majors.

courseSection0.text: Not open to Journalism, Radio-TV, or Advertising/Public Relations majors.

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.Grades below \"C\" (2.0) in lower level: Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted in the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Nicholson School of Communication and Media.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the course.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted in the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Nicholson School of Communication and Media.

courseSection1.text:
Prerequisite Courses

Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the course.

courseSection0.text1: RTV3007 - Development and Structure of Electronic Media and New Technology (3)

courseSection1.text0: Additional restricted electives can be taken as approved by an advisor.
courseSection1.text1:
Complete at least 4 of the following: 
ADV3008 - Principles of Advertising (3)
ADV4103 - Radio-Television Advertising (3)
ADV4300 - Advertising Media Planning (3)
FIL2030 - History of Motion Pictures (3)
FIL3006 - Art of the Cinema (3)
FIL4830 - Motion Picture Genre (3)
JOU3004 - History of American Journalism (3)
JOU3015 - Principles of Journalism (3)
JOU4700 - Journalism Ethics (3)
MMC3200 - Mass Communication Law (3)
MMC3630 - Social Media as Mass Communication (3)
MMC4300 - International Media (3)
MMC4602 - Contemporary Media Issues (3)
RTV3511 - Production Fundamentals and Aesthetics of Electronic Media (3)
RTV4403 - Electronic Media, Technology, and Society (3)
RTV4503 - Sports Programming in Electronic Media (3)
RTV4700 - Regulation of Broadcasting (3)

li.Internship, co-op, or independent study: Internship, co-op, or independent study credit can be used toward the minor with prior school permission.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

Internship, co-op, or independent study credit can be used toward the minor with prior school permission.
